name.label: Name of the task
name.tooltip: Name of the task, be aware that the task name is used also as a function name

wcet.label: Worst case execution time
wcet.tooltip: Worst case execution time in ticks

floatingPoint.label: Floating point
floatingPoint.tooltip: Enable floating point for the current thread

isIdle.label: Is the task an idle task
isIdle.tooltip: Is the task an idle task

isSysJob.label: Is the task a sysJob wrapper
isSysJob.tooltip: Is the task a sysJob wrapper

stackSize.label: stack size of the task
stackSize.tooltip: Stack size of the current task
